channel.title: community spotlight on YosysHQ Blog
channel.description: Recent content in community spotlight on YosysHQ Blog

item.title: Community Spotlight - sv2v
item.description: sv2v Welcome to another community spotlight article where we shine a light on open source EDA projects. If you want to submit a project, please do so here. sv2v converts SystemVerilog (IEEE 1800-2017) to Verilog (IEEE 1364-2005), with an emphasis on supporting synthesizable language constructs. Zachary Snow’s Bio I received my B.S. in computer science from Carnegie Mellon University in 2019. After graduating, I began working full-time as a software engineer in systematic trading.

item.title: Community Spotlight - Tbengy
item.description: Tbengy Welcome to the first in a series of short articles where we shine the light on open source EDA projects. If you want to submit a project, please do so here. Tbengy by Prasad Pandit is a Python Tool for SV/UVM Testbench Generation and RTL Synthesis. The tool uses newly available capability of the Vivado tool by Xilinx to compile and run SV/UVM Testbench and syntheize RTL for Digilent FPGA Boards.
